title: Join our Giro d'Italia fantasy league
content:
Joe Robinson
7 May 2021

We are running a Giro d'Italia fantasy league with Scorito. Can you have bragging rights among your cycling friends?

The Giro d'Italia is fast approaching, starting in Turin on Saturday 8th May, and what better way to enjoy the best Grand Tour of the season than by having bragging rights over your cycling buddies?

Being able to boast that you had backed Jumbo-Visma's David Dekker as sprinting's next best thing and that you always knew Deceuninck-QuickStep's Remco Evenepoel was going to romp to the Maglia Rosa while settling down mid-ride over a slice of coffee and walnut cake.

If you truly back yourself as an armchair Patrick Lefevere, how about proving it with Cyclist's Giro d'Italia fantasy game?

We have teamed up with the good people over at Scorito to bring you the ultimate fantasy cycling game for Il Giro, starting next week.

If you want to join, click here now!

The rules are quite simple. You are given a team budget of €46 million to pick 20 riders to represent you throughout the race. Take your pick of the General Classification men, sprinters, rouleurs, puncheurs and wide-eyed opportunists.

Before each stage, you get the chance to pick your nine riders for that day – including a road captain who will earn double points – giving you the opportunity to tailor your day's team to the stage's parcours. 

Using the Scorito app usually costs £3.99. However, it will be FREE for all those who sign up via the Cyclist Magazine league. All you need to do is click the link below and sign up today:

If you want to join, click here now!

And to celebrate the Giro d'Italia, the winner of the Cyclist Magazine Giro fantasy league will win a year's subscription to the magazine and a copy of Cyclist's 'The Rides: Vol 2' worth £30. T&Cs apply.
